objects.text:
✓ Spinning Palm Tree & Leaf Bed
✓ Relaxing Hammock for Kitties
✓ 9 Pieces Including 2 Cats
✓ Food Bowls & Toys Included

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This cheerful banner features a playful, pink-themed background enhanced with whimsical abstract waves and rounded frame accents. At the top left, the primary heading (id: `heading`) is bold and attention-grabbing in a vivid pink font. Directly below, the subheading (id: `subheading`) provides supporting context in a striking purple hue. The product benefits and features are listed in a clean, aligned text block (id: `description`) to maintain readability and organization. A large product image (id: `product_image`) occupies the center-right area, clearly showcasing the toy. The bold price tag (id: `price`) stands out in magenta, and a solid pink call-to-action button (id: `cta_button`) with white text (id: `cta`) encourages immediate shopping.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFF0F5` (background)
- Bright Pink: `#FF1493` (CTA and heading)
- Dark Purple: `#8A2BE2` (subheading, decorative circles)
- Teal: `#40E0D0` (wavy accent lines)
- Charcoal: `#333333` (description text)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (content panel and CTA text)
product_color: This product image showcases a bright, playful color palette perfect for appealing to children. Key colors include vibrant pink (#F75BB2) in the treehouse roof, mint green (#48C79C) for the canopy and foliage, sandy beige (#F6C8A2) for the base, and accent colors like lavender (#CAA5EA), sky blue (#50C9E3), and purple (#9F5ACB). These colors are intentionally high-saturation to draw attention, yet they blend harmoniously through thematic repetition. The green and pink dominate while being contrasted by pastel tones of the accessories, making every component visible and engaging. A banner ad can utilize these tones to evoke fun, warmth, and playful imagination.
